description:
go.tools/go/types: use qualified names when printing types in errors

Also: Require that clean package paths are not ".".

messages.text:
*** Submitted as https://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=c3b7abbc6dc9&repo=tools ***

go.tools/go/types: use qualified names when printing types in errors

Also: Require that clean package paths are not ".".

R=adonovan, r
CC=golang-dev
https://codereview.appspot.com/10368047

Hello adonovan (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

I'd like you to review this change to
https://code.google.com/p/go.tools
Is it easy to provide a test?

somewhat easy, but wait, we (adonovan and I) are discussing a better
approach
